greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the area of the regular 7-gon (heptagon) of circumradius = 1.
comment: Equivalently, the area in the complex plane of the smallest convex set containing all order-7 roots of unity.
link: Eric Weisstein et al., "Root of Unity."
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, "de Moivre Number."
results.author: Joseph Biberstine (jrbibers(AT)indiana.edu), Mar 30 2005
